review: Way beyond my expectations...easy installation and access.  The remote, especially with voice search, is great and easy to use.  Lots of contant and choice, especially on Amazon Prime.  Also provides easy access to Netflix, Hulu Plus, etc., simply by downloading "apps" like you would on your smart phone.  Really great system. For those who might have questions, you need to maintain your subscription to Netflix, Hulu, etc., and I would recommend subscribing to Amazon Prime ($99/year - ~$8.50/month - on a par with Netflix., etc), but there is still lots of free content available.  I haven't yet spent a lot of time surfing TV shows, but it seems that there are a lot available.  Current shows (like Big Bang Theory, one of my favorites) seem to be available for fee only, probably due to licensing agreements.  But, be that as it may, it will allow me to dump a whole lot of my cable programming, and save me over $100/month.

review: This device is simply amazing. My husband loves to watch movies and this enables him to choose from thousands of movies.any time he wants. It's very easy to use Just one click of the remote and everything is right there. It's like having a library of movies right in your living room. The nice thing about this also is if you get tired of a movie or get interrupted and can't finish it , you can go back and resume it where you left off. Thanks Amazon for an amazing gadget.
